title: Google\Cloud\Spanner\Admin\Instance\V1\InstanceConfig
name: InstanceConfig
description:
A possible configuration for a Cloud Spanner instance. Configurations define the geographic placement of nodes and their replication.

Generated from protobuf message google.spanner.admin.instance.v1.InstanceConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: A unique identifier for the instance configuration. Values are of the form projects/<project>/instanceConfigs/[a-z][-a-z0-9]*

params.name: data.display_name
params.description: The name of this instance configuration as it appears in UIs.

params.name: data.replicas
params.description: The geographic placement of nodes in this instance configuration and their replication properties.
